page.title: 16Facilities in Brinklow
page.content: The shopping facilities in Brinklow include a post office combined with a newsagency,two general stores,butcher, a bakery combined with a tea shop,drug store,florist and hair stylist.There are two garages for repairs and petrol one of which sells hardware.The nearest large stores are Asda and Tesco,both of which are in Coventry. Many villagers do their main weekly shopping at these supermarkets.There are 5 public houses,2 with restaurants a small licensed restaurant and a fish and chip shop.The village has regular visits from a mobile library, fishmonger and greengrocer and a butcher.Brinklow has a royal charter for a country market to be held every year in July.Other facilities include a plumber,electrical contractor, undertaker and a fire station manned by local part-time firemen.
